SDA.modeladvisor.BaseModelAdvisor module

class SDA.modeladvisor.BaseModelAdvisor.BaseModelAdvisor(dataset_meta_path, train_path, eval_path, settings)[source]

Bases: object

Model Advisor Base, Model Advisor is used to create w/wo sigopt parameter advise based on model type

conn

sigopt connection

experiment

current experiment which is either created by this run or fetched by history experiment id

params

params include dataset_path, save_path, global_configs, model_parameters, passed by arguments or hydroai-defaults.conf

Type

dict

assignment_model_tracker

a tracker map of assigned_parameters and its corresponding model path

Type

dict

find_model_by_assignment(assignments)[source]

This method is used to find model saved path by corresponding assignment

Parameters

assignment (Assignment) – sigopt assignment of model parameters

Returns

model_path – trained model saved path

Return type

str

generate_sigopt_yaml()[source]

generate parameter range based on model type and passed-in params for sigopt

Returns

sigopt_parameters – sigopt parameter including ranged model parameter and metrics based on model type

Return type

dict

get_best_parameters_from_best_assignments(best_assignments)[source]

This method is used to get model parameter assignment from BestAssignments

Parameters

best_assignments (BestAssignments) – sigopt returned best_assignment

Returns

assignment

Return type

Assignment

get_metrics_from_best_assignments(best_assignments)[source]

This method is used to get metrics from BestAssignments

Parameters

best_assignments (BestAssignments) – sigopt returned best_assignment

Returns

metrics

Return type

list

initialize_model_parameter(assignments=None)[source]

generate parameters based on model type for wo sigopt case

Parameters

assignments (dict) – optional user defined or sigopt suggested parameters

Returns

model_parameters – model parameter based on model type

Return type

dict

initialize_sigopt(experiment_id=None)[source]

This method is used to prepare sigopt including call generate_sigopt_yaml and setup_sigopt_connection

Parameters

experiment_id (str) – history sigopt experiment_id for this task, when this is not None, we can use this id to fetch previous experiment

Returns

sigopt_experiment_id – sigopt experiment id for this task

Return type

str

launch_train()[source]

This method will launch train w/wo sugopt according to config

Returns

  • model_path (str) – best trained model saved path

  • metrics (list) – A list of this best trained model infomation

  • parameters (dict) – A dict of best model parameters for this training

record_assignmet(assignments, model_path)[source]

This method is used to record latest assignment with its trained model path

Parameters

  • assignment (Assignment) – sigopt assignment of model parameters

  • model_path (str) – trained model saved path

train_model(args)[source]

launch train with passed-in model parameters

Parameters

args (dict) – global parameters like pnn, host; model_parameter from sigopt suggestion or model pre-defined

Returns

  • training_time (float)

  • model_path (str)

  • metrics (list)

update_metrics()[source]

update return metrics based on training result, normally training script should have a stdout output or a result.yaml file, and this method will pass this file and return metrics

Returns

metrics – metrics from training output, maybe AUC, MAP, training_time, etc

Return type

list
